short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remplace les RіbеуSmile par des RibeySmile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension get all the text content loaded on the webpage and convert the word  "ribeySmile" to an image of the RibeySmile emote and replace it in the text.
